entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
